verbs.description: Just days before President Trump [V: is] expected to announce whether or not he will withdraw the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal , Iranian Americans will hold their first national convention since 2006 , meeting in Washington on Saturday at a time when many feel buoyed by a more supportive president in the White House .
